Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $95. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your interest and appreciation for high-quality products. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the excellence of our product at a discounted rate. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
